beer.beer_description:
Hold on tight! The Pirate Life x Mountain Culture IIPA just landed, and it’s here for a good time... 
 
#2 in our collaborative series blends both brewery’s distinctive styles. It’s bold, punchy, and (of course) brimming with hoppy charm.  
 
You’ll score bucketloads of character from the Mosy, Simcoe, and Nelson + stacks of fruitiness from the Krush, a new hop strain outta the States.
 
We had a ball making this beer - a journey fuelled by flavour, heartfelt high-fives, and a mutual love for the craft.

What happens when you take two or more amazing breweries, throw them into the tank and let them ferment together? An amazing collaboration beer, that’s what! Cheers to working together to create the perfect flavor. That's 45 different beers that have been brewed as a collaboration. Try 5 more for Level 10!

items.checkin_comment: A bargain for $4. Thank you BWS

Looking for more kick than a session beer, but want to be able to stay for a few rounds? You have to keep it in the middle. That's 465 beers with an ABV greater than 5% and less than 10%.  Try 5 more for Level 94!

What happens when you take two or more amazing breweries, throw them into the tank and let them ferment together? An amazing collaboration beer, that’s what! Cheers to working together to create the perfect flavor. That's 120 different beers that have been brewed as a collaboration. Try 5 more for Level 25!

When a single isn’t enough, make it a double. Doubling the hops and malts in a recipe results in a higher ABV and can pack quite a boozey punch. That's 350 different beers with the style that contains Imperial / Double in its style name. Try 5 more for Level 71!

one beer at a time.

items.checkin_comment:
Candied citrus and pine nose and flavours. 
Bitter grapefruit and green pine finish and linger.

user.bio: I love to try new good things in beer, wine and spirits. Quality trumps quantity. Enjoy reds, barrel aged stouts and haz

On the lookout for different, creative brews throughout New England and beyond.
Blog:
https://newenglandbeerbuddy.com/
